extends java.lang.Object
    Manager for Madvoc result handlers.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllActionResults

        public java.util.Set<ActionResult> getAllActionResults()
        Returns all action results as new set.

      • register

        public ActionResult register(java.lang.Class<? extends ActionResult> resultClass)
        Registers an action result handler and returns created ActionResult if result with same type doesn't exist. Otherwise, returns existing result and created one will be ignored.

      • register

        protected ActionResult register(ActionResult result)
        Registers new action result instance. If action result of the same class is already registered, registration will be skipped. If result for the same result type or same target class exist, it will be replaced! However, default Jodd results will never replace other results. After the registration, results are initialized.

      • lookup

        public ActionResult lookup(ActionRequest actionRequest,
                           java.lang.Object resultObject)
        Lookups for action result handler based on current action request and action method result object.

      • initializeResult

        protected void initializeResult(ActionResult result)
        Initializes action result.

      • createResult

        protected ActionResult createResult(java.lang.Class<? extends ActionResult> actionResultClass)
        Creates new ActionResult.
